ygData.subject: Re: What's the Point?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... and valued application? The Jig o Vigor saved my life when I crashed and ended up in the Ocean of Tears. It was the only thing that allowed me to stay
ygData.messageBody:
>Likewise, I find the Jig o' Vigor to be of no use. Have I missed some good
and valued application?


The Jig o' Vigor saved my life when I crashed and ended up in the Ocean of
Tears. It was the only thing that allowed me to stay swimming whilst I
petitioned a gm to get me out of there. No, I didn't have the water
breathing song, either. Note to other bards: Put this song on and swim into
a wall head slightly up, then go eat lunch, if you want to improve your
swimming dramatically. ;-)

The Mystery Minstrel of Mithaniel Marr
